name: Senseless Caving
description:
NOTE - may take up to a minute to load.

A nihilistic roguelike about the impermanence of life and the resources needed to sustain it. Developed over a 3 month period as a technical demonstration with comprehensive progress documentation.

Explore a dark system of procedurally generated caves, collecting and consuming resources in a futile attempt to preserve the final living flame.

ESSENTIAL CONTROLS

WASD - move

Q/E - menu

N - use resource

M - drop resource

SECONDARY CONTROLS

B - drop resource stack

Space - grab single resource
